prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with bright yellow and purple accents that resembles a spider.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a small, electric spider with a playful personality.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that has a unique blend of yellow and purple colors.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a web-weaving creature found in urban areas.
Imagine a bug and electric-type Pokemon with striking features and a vibrant color palette.
Design a Pokemon that has an arachnid appearance and is known for its agility and speed.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has an energetic and mischievous demeanor.
